answers.author: Evelina Moulder
answers.text:
Hi Jim,
It's automatically submitted after you complete it. They are adding a feature this year that will allow you to print out your suvrey, but it isn't available yet.
Best regards,
Evelina

author: Jim Cushing
text:
i just filled out this survey but didn't have any chance to print it out.  how can i get the info submitted?  thanks.
Jim Cushing
City of Kissimmee FL
title: Police and Fire Survey 2011
